attributes.review: Trump — T stands for terrorist. After I downloaded the app really bad things started to happen. There was a global pandemic that killed millions of people. Murder hornets tormented people. Black people continued to be killed and oppressed. And that’s not even all of it. 0/10 would definitely not recommend this app or this President
attributes.title: Scarring experience

attributes.review: I wanted to get ‘this app for me and my 3 kids so we culd see how grate of an President Trump is by as soon as I downloaded it on my sons I PAD he screamed with with terror all becuse of the opening image now he will not sleazy in his own bed because of it and on top of that we had to preforms an séance to destroy the I PAD. You ruined my poor baby
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review:
This app supports a racist rapist that is trying to run this country for personal gain. So many this have gone bad since he has been in office. Let’s not make that mistake again. The Russians wanted him to be president so that he would tear this nation apart. Let’s not let him do that. Vote that bastard our.  
BLM✊🏻✊🏽✊🏿
attributes.title: App sends horrible message

attributes.review: So I downloaded this app and my soul started to disappear! I felt like I was being ripped apart limb from limb! This app gave me urges to bury myself in a hole! Trump is horrible! When I tried to delete the app I felt my phone get hot and Mike Pence appeared beside me and tried to perform a mind trick on me it didn’t work so he smacked me! 🤬
attributes.title: It’ll give you nightmares!

attributes.review: This app is a scam, and it disgusts me that there are people who would really fall for this. I downloaded this app and I’ve received at least three (3) texts every day begging me to donate money, but to who?? Where will it go? And the language seems like that of junk mail from adult dating sites. Despicable.
attributes.title: Scam

attributes.review: What else is there to say? Why support a racist homophobic and xenophobic person who continues to look out for themselves. I’ve been done with this president even before he became president, I look forward to a day when we don’t have to talk about him.
attributes.title: Worst App ever for the worst US President

attributes.review: I would like if trump does not get rid of tiktok the reason I asked is because the tiktok app help me what my depression and anxiety and tiktok saved my life yt had been my biggest support for months I would like to suggest and ask if he could not take away my happiness and everybody else’s happiness😁
attributes.title: #savetiktok

attributes.review: This was the least helpful app ever. All it did was refer me to some guy named Donald? He seems like a real joke. Why would anyone want him as a president? Not to mention he looks like a Cheeto puff mixed with an overly racist, chubby, small wee weed, dumb, white male. I’m honestly surprised the app is still up in the App Store. Apple should take it down IMMEDIATELY.
attributes.title: SO BAD

attributes.review: The quality of this app is awful. Sends to WAYYY to many notifications. You would think someone with soooo much money would create a good app but no. The quality of app and person isn’t it. HIGHY RECOMMEND not downloading cause it took forever to load also.. Worst app ever... DO NOT DOWNLOAD :)
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: This app is terrible I believe it deserves less than 1 star and my rating matches up with how I would rate our actual president. Please all download and give a 1star review to take it down!! Who’s with me!!! Also vote Biden (he’s the only option right now folks)!
attributes.title: Please read!! Important
